product_name: Partners West 100 Hikes in Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington - 4th Edition
long_description: 100 Hikes in Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington guides you on treks to waterfalls on Mount Hood, wildflowers at the Columbia Gorge and nature parks outside Portland, just to name a few.
short_description: 100 Hikes in Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington guides you on treks to waterfalls on Mount Hood, wildflowers at the Columbia Gorge and nature parks outside Portland, just to name a few.
